dcterms:creator: A. Michaels
dcterms:description: A versatile electromagnetic optimization package used to perform 2D simulations of single-polarization grating couplers.
dcterms:title: EMopt

dcterms:creator: J. Jiang
J. A. Fan
dcterms:description: A dataset used for global optimization of dielectric metasurfaces using a physics-driven neural network.
dcterms:title: GLOnet

dcterms:creator: J. Jiang
J. A. Fan
dcterms:description: A dataset for simulator-based training of generative neural networks aimed at the inverse design of metasurfaces.
dcterms:title: Simulator-based training of generative neural networks for the inverse design of metasurfaces

dcterms:creator: A. Michaels
E. Yablonovitch
dcterms:description: A dataset for the inverse design of near unity efficiency perfectly vertical grating couplers.
dcterms:title: Design of fully apodized and perfectly vertical surface grating couplers

dcterms:creator: S. Hooten
T. V. Vaerenbergh
P. Sun
S. Mathai
Z. Huang
R. G. Beausoleil
dcterms:description: A dataset for the adjoint optimization of efficient CMOS-compatible Si-SiN vertical grating couplers for DWDM applications.
dcterms:title: Adjoint Optimization of Efficient CMOS-Compatible Si-SiN Vertical Grating Couplers
